comments:
Description:
NPE throws out when drag one dimension under another dimension in the cube[1101]

Build number: 
2.2.0.v20070417-0630

Steps to reproduce:
1, New a cube with three dimensions
2, Drag the first dimension under the second dimension in the cube

Expected result:
No exceptions occurs
Actual result:
NPE occurs
Error log:
